____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add weapons to the cargo space of vehicles, which can be taken out by infantry units. 

MP Synchronized</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicleName [[addWeaponCargoGlobal]] [weaponName, count] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]] - vehicle to add the weapons to </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [weaponName, count]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> weaponName: [[String]] - weapon name. See the topic [[:Category:Weapons]] for reference about possible values. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> count: [[Number]] - number of weapons to add. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_truck [[addWeaponCargoGlobal]] ["M16", 5];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
